org.drip.state.estimator

Class LinearCurveCalibrator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.state.estimator.SmoothingCurveStretchParams
      • org.drip.state.estimator.GlobalControlCurveParams
        • org.drip.state.estimator.LinearCurveCalibrator

  • public class LinearCurveCalibrator
extends GlobalControlCurveParams
    LinearCurveCalibrator creates the discount curve span from the instrument cash flows. The span construction may be customized using specific settings provided in GlobalControlCurveParams.
